content: I saw it once when I was little... Sadly, I could never find that Islet again.
info: NPC成长等级-2级演出-1013萨飞里_萨飞里

content: {A加油}<style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>! Have you ever seen an Islet completely covered in blue fluorite?
info: NPC成长等级-2级演出-1013萨飞里_萨飞里

content: But I was thinking... Maybe there is a way for you to see it too. Here, take this <style=Highlight>{奖励名称}</style>!
